銿字的基本解释

銿
zhōng
古同“鐘”，古代一种打击乐器。

銿
yōng
古同“镛”。

銿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhōng］
［《集韻》諸容切，平鍾，章。］
同“鐘1”。
古代打击乐器名。
[②]［yōng］
［《廣韻》餘封切，平鍾，以。］
同“鏞1”。

銿字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　銿； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1306第18
【說文】同鐘。詳後鐘字註。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?同鏞。詳後鏞字註。

銿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
銿字的起名意思

暂无。

銿
Basic explanation of words
銿
zhōng
In ancient times, the "bell" was a percussion instrument in ancient times.
銿
yōng
Ancient Tong "Yong".
銿
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhōng］
["Jiyun" Zhu Rongqie, Pingzhong, chapter. ]
Same as "Clock 1".
Names of ancient percussion instruments.
[②]［yōng］
["Guangyun" Yu Fengqie, Pingzhong, to. ]
Same as "Yong 1".
銿
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　銿; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1306 Page 18
[Said the text] The same clock. Detailed note after the clock.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Same with Yong. The Yung word note is detailed later.
